import React from 'react'; import OrderTable from '../ordertable/ordertable.component'; // import NewOrderItem from '../new-order-item/new-order-item.component'; import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table'; import './orderpage.styles.scss'; class OrderPage extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state={ active: [], unconfirmed: [], complete: [], stat: String } } componentDidMount(){ if(localStorage.userID){ fetch(`/users/neworders/${localStorage.userID}`) .then(res=> res.json()) .then(unconfirmed => this.setState({unconfirmed})) fetch(`/users/pendingorders/${localStorage.userID}`) .then(res=> res.json()) .then(active => this.setState({active})) fetch(`/users/completedorders/${localStorage.userID}`) .then(res=> res.json()) .then(complete => this.setState({complete})) fetch(`/users/status/${localStorage.userID}`) .then(res=> res.json()) .then(status=> this.setState({status})) } } render() { return (
Restaurant Status
Pending Confirmation {this.state.unconfirmed.length}
{this.state.unconfirmed.map(({ id, ...otherSectionProps }) => ( ))}
Order number Items Total Price Order Type Address Status
Active Orders {this.state.active.length}
{this.state.active.map(({ id, ...otherSectionProps }) => ( ))}
Order number Items Total Price Order Type Address Status
Completed Orders {this.state.complete.length}
{this.state.complete.map(({ id, ...otherSectionProps }) => ( ))}
Order number Items Total Price Order Type Address Status
); } } export default OrderPage;
